case.title: About that spanking (Manhattan)
case.text:
I am fairly fit and easy on the eyes. You will find me intelligent, creative, and friendly. I have been providing serious discipline spankings for women in need for very many years. This spanking is for punishment only. There is no eroticism or any other contact. You will get the bare bottom spanking you know you deserve.
I may use a hairbrush, paddle, strap, or cane depending upon what we determine are your needs. It would be unusual for me to just use my hand. This spanking will hurt more than you imagine. It is a spanking. It is supposed to hurt. It isn't a beating or abuse. It is a real discipline spanking, not role play. You probably will take home marks. That is just what happens when you get a hard spanking. You will feel it every time you sit down for a day or so. Maybe longer if you really deserve it.
We will discuss your needs and desires. You do not have to tell me why you are being punished. I will listen if it will make you feel better. We will decide upon the type of punishment you will receive. Once we agree, you will get exactly what we decided upon. I will not take any nonsense once the punishment begins. Crying is OK, but it doesn't stop the spanking. A spanking isn't a spanking until you really want it to stop. If you don't understand that, you don't want to be punished. The severity of the spanking is based upon your own sensitivity. You will have no doubt you are being punished. You will feel cared for. I spank you for your own benefit in a safe, sane environment.
The result of your spanking will be an adrenaline filled euphoria filled with emotion and release, whether it be from guilt, stress, or whatever else is in your head.
Please contact me only if you are truly looking for a serious punishment spanking and all that it entails. One liners and endless email are not acceptable. If you are serious, you will include some pertinent details about yourself, including your experience with being spanked, your age, and what you hope to get out of this encounter.
